title: BluPine Energy secures Rs 239 crore funding from Tata Capital
description: BluPine Energy on Monday said it has secured Rs 239 crore financial assistance from Tata Capital. The amount will be utilised towards a solar power project in Chhattisgarh, the company said in a statement. The 75 megawatt project is expected to generate nearly 117 million units (MUs) of energy annually and offset more than 107,000 tonne of Co2 emissions, it said.
